name: Gnoll
description: Gnolls are feral humanoids that resemble hyenas, known for their brutal and savage behavior. They are often seen as marauding bands, driven by a hunger for destruction and flesh. Gnolls worship the demon lord Yeenoghu and are feared for their insatiable bloodlust and relentless aggression.
languages: You can speak, read, and write Common and Gnoll.
special: Rampage: When you reduce a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on your turn, you can take a bonus action to move up to half your speed and make a bite attack.
